entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
